application.name: TuxPusher
application.summary: A fun coin pusher game featuring Tux!

ul.li: Getting a gold coin in a silver slot rewards you 2x silver coins.
Getting a gold coin in a gold slot rewards you 2x gold coins.
Getting a tux in a slot when you already have the tux gives you 6x gold coins and 6x silver coins.

p.i: Just move around your mouse and click to release a coin.

description.p: Notes There is a command line option that allows you to set the coin deployment speed, but also every time you "lose" a game, the new round will start with a faster deployment speed than the last, just to keep things exciting. ;)
